text: Peter Blakeley is an Australian Adult Contemporary singer and songwriter. Blakeley has released three solo albums and eleven singles. Blakeley was a lead singer for Rockmelons in the mid-1980s and launched his solo career in 1987 and had a hit single in Australia in 1990 with "Crying in the Chapel" (not the 1950s song). ==Studio albums== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" !
